item.title: Help....wont say im online when i am!
item.dc:creator: @zammy1 zammy!!
item.description:
@zammy1 wrote:

im trying to make npcs say im online but when im online they say im not and when im offline they same im offline can any1 help please?

this is my code

		else if (npcs[i].npcType == 2253)
					{
						if (misc.random2(10) <= 3) //this is the time delay
						{
							npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
							npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
							if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("pker12"))
							{
								npcs[i].textUpdate = "the owner is online...so be good!";
							}
							else
							{
								npcs[i].textUpdate = "the owner is offline...so do anything!";
							}

Read full topic
item.source: Help....wont say im online when i am!
